contents:
Electrical  and  electronic  apparatus  for
information  and  data  input  and  transmission,  in  particular  data  input
terminals  and  network  communication  apparatus;  recorded  computer
programs, electronic and optical measuring and monitoring apparatus and
instruments,  as  well  as  luminous  or  mechanical  signalssound  recording,
transmitting  and  reproducing  apparatus,  apparatus  and  instruments  for
conducting,  distributing,  transforming,  storing,  regulating  or  controlling
electric  current;  alarm  apparatus  and  systems  and  parts  thereof;  electric
monitoring apparatus.
Development,  design  and  maintenance  of  computer  programs
for  input  and  transmission  of  data,  and  industrial  research  in  onnection
with  input  and  transmission  of  data  and  consulting  for  this  purpose.
